description: Learners will be introduced to designing lesson plans based on principles and knowledge of learning outcomes, assessment plans, methods, materials, classroom management, and learning activities; access and use professional resources. Learners will be invited to conduct live action research and demonstrate knowledge of other research approaches by demonstrating their knowledge of research design, interpreting common language research data, and creating research questions that are methodologically sound.
title: Teach English Now! Course Design and Classroom Management
instructors: Dr. Justin Shewell and Dr. Shane Dixon
